title: Looking for a serif with Specific R
content:
I'm looking for a Serif typeface with a specific R. It has a weird diagonal that looks a bit like a tail.. I cant seem to find a fitting typeface that has the same letter. I've attached an image of it.. . Anybody?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [R.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150424141637/http:/typophile.com/files/Schermafbeelding%202014-02-16%20om%2013.41.35.png) | 27.6 KB |
author: Baxendale

comments.content: You might have better results if you posted this in the Type ID forum. ==\> [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20150424141637/http:/www.typophile.com/typeid)
